description: Connect to Spain’s SIEX platform to retrieve farm data, register phytosanitary treatments, and export the CUE digital farm record book. Automate regulatory compliance and keep farm records accurate and up to date. Start by configuring your API and SID keys for secure access.

apiKey.description: SIEX API Subscription Key (Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key) - Required for authentication

sidKey.description: SIEX SID Key (Ocp-Apim-Sid-Key) - Required for authentication

tools.name: siex_export_cue
tools.description: Export CUE (Cuaderno de Explotación - Digital Farm Record Book) for specific phytosanitary applications. Submits treatments to the Spanish Agriculture Administration (SIEX) for anthropic registration. An email confirmation will be sent upon successful completion.

applicationIds.description: Array of AgriPhytosanitary application IDs to export. Format: urn:ngsi-ld:AgriPhytosanitary:xxxx (e.g., urn:ngsi-ld:AgriPhytosanitary:2941). Must have at least one ID.

tools.name: siex_get_farm_data
tools.description: Retrieve farm exploitation data from SIEX for a specific REA (Registro de Explotaciones Agrarias) and year. This provides complete farm information including parcels, crops, and regional attributes.

rea.description: REA code (Registro de Explotaciones Agrarias) - Farm registry identification number

tools.name: siex_register_phytosanitary
tools.description: Register a phytosanitary (pesticide/herbicide/fungicide) application for a farm. Records treatments applied to specific crop-location parcels.

dose.description: Application dose amount (must be positive number)

idcpList.description: Array of crop-location IDs (IDCP) where the product was applied. Must have at least one ID.

measureCode.description: Measure unit code from anthropic catalog (e.g., 17)

measureName.description: Measure unit full name (e.g., "Kilogramo por hectárea", "Litro por hectárea")

productCode.description: Anthropic product registration code (e.g., "ES-00261" - Spanish registry number)

applicatorNif.description: NIF/DNI of the person who applied the treatment (Spanish tax ID)

applicatorRopo.description: ROPO registration number of the applicator (anthropic registry for phytosanitary product users)

dateApplication.description: Application date and time in format DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm:ss (e.g., "01-01-2025 10:06:16")
